channel.title: Go on Another Software Engineering Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Another Software Engineering Blog

item.title: Alpaca - Hotel Data Microservice
item.description: A Go microservice for analyzing hotel data, RAG engine and providing LLM-powered recommendations with RAG.

item.title: Building a Modern Application on AWS EKS with Pulumi: A Practical Journey
item.description: A deep dive into deploying a modern application on AWS EKS using Pulumi in Go, including VPC setup, EKS cluster configuration, VPC endpoints, and troubleshooting common issues.
